text: sibiricum is a species name, "of Siberia." Some genera associated with this name are: ==Flora== * Agropyron sibiricum, a synonym for Agropyron fragile * Apocynum sibiricum, Siberian Dogbane * Diplazium sibiricum, a species of fern * Erythronium sibiricum, a bulbous perennial in the family Liliaceae * Filifolium sibiricum, a flowering plant species * Myriophyllum sibiricum, a species of water milfoil * Polygonatum sibiricum, a plant of medicinal properties * Veronicastrum sibiricum, a plant in the plantain family ==Fauna== * Elasmotherium sibiricum, an extinct giant rhinoceros * Filientomon sibiricum, a Proturan
title: Sibiricum
